full_summary:
====================================
### Solicitation Title

E6VIC-220004 - RMSO Food Products

### Solicitation Reference Number

WS3749661435-Doc3963102106

### Amendment Number

6

### Publication Date

2023-06-10

### Tender Closing Date and Time

2023-07-18T14:00:00

### Solicitation Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites suppliers to submit a proposal for a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for the supply and delivery of various food items to kitchens and ships of various Federal Government Departments and Agencies within the Pacific Region.

### Product Classification

* Meat and poultry products (50110000)
* Dairy products and eggs (50130000)
* Bread and bakery products (50180000)
* Fresh fruits (50300000)

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

### Regions of Opportunity

British Columbia

### Deliveries

Deliveries will be made to kitchens and ships located within the Pacific Region, specifically in British Columbia.

### Contracting Entity

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5

### End User Entities

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5

### Contact Information

Angela Nakade,	RCSG/ TGSPC
effectuer.gcc@ gcc. tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
